description: A simple fabric covering tied over the eyes to block sight.  Useful for sleeping in bright areas.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A huge duffel bag with backpack attached, both packed to the gills.  Judging by the feel, a National Guard soldier could have packed this to be ready for deployment.  Activate to unpack and enjoy.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A huge duffel bag with backpack attached, both packed to the gills.  You have packed this to be ready for deployment.  Activate to unpack and enjoy.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This is a mining helmet with a heavy-duty LED flashlight.  Using this will turn the flashlight on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This is a mining helmet with a heavy-duty LED flashlight.  The flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A plastic mask with a very dark visor, meant to protect the entire face while welding.  It also serves as somewhat good armor, but makes it hard to see.  Activate it to push it up your head.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A crude welding mask made from shaped steel.  It's less dark than a proper welding mask, and therefore less difficult to see in, but also less protective when welding.  Activate it to push it up your head.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A crude welding mask made from shaped steel.  It's less dark than a proper welding mask, and therefore less difficult to see in, but also less protective when welding.  Activate it to lower it over your face.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A plastic mask with a very dark visor, meant to protect the entire face while welding.  It also serves as somewhat good armor, but makes it hard to see.  Activate it to lower it over your face.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A high-crowned, wide-brimmed, sable colored fedora.  Its brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.  The perfect hat for treasure hunting.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: This is a pair of socks with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Internally powered by a maximum of ten plutonium fuel cells, this full-body suit of sleek black military armor represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's non-rigid powered armor technology.  Use it to turn it on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Internally powered by a maximum of ten plutonium fuel cells, this full-body suit of sleek black military armor represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's non-rigid powered armor technology.  It is turned on, and continually draining power.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Covered in interlocking plates of reflective metal, this advanced suit resembles both plate armor and an astronaut's spacesuit.  Designed to protect its wearer during extra dimensional excursions, it offers unparalleled environmental protection, both in this Earth and beyond.  Use it to turn it on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Covered in interlocking plates of reflective metal, this advanced suit resembles both plate armor and an astronaut's spacesuit.  It is turned on, and continually draining power.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A mask worn over your mouth which, when loaded with the proper filters, recycles your exhaled breath for rebreathing while underwater.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A mask that straps over your mouth and nose and filters air.  Protects from smoke, dust, and other contaminants quite well.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, Nomex-insulated gas mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from heat, smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A full-face mask commonly used by firefighters.  The protective breathing apparatus provides excellent protection from smoke, flame, and other dangers.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, steel reinforced gas mask that covers the face and eyes.  Provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, reinforced gas mask that covers the face and eyes.  Provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, leather reinforced gas mask that covers the face and eyes.  Provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, fur-trimmed gas mask that covers the face and eyes.  Quite warm, it still provides excellent protection from smoke, teargas, and shrapnel.  It must be prepared before use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL light amp goggles
name.str_pl: pairs of XL light amp goggles

description: A pair of battery-powered goggles that amplify ambient light, allowing you to see in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL light amp goggles (on)
name.str_pl: pairs of XL light amp goggles (on)

description: A pair of battery-powered light amplifying goggles with an infrared illuminator, allowing you to see in the dark.  It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  Use it to turn it on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This is a fluffy and large towel.  It could be used to dry yourself.  Any person that can travel the length and breadth of the apocalypse, rough it, slum it, struggle against terrible odds, win through and still know where their towel is, is clearly a force to be reckoned with.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
This is a large, sopping wet towel.  If you wait a little bit, it should dry out.  Don't panic.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
This is a large towel, covered in a thick, gooey liquid.  You'll need to wash it in some water to make it usable again.  Don't panic.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Straw fedora hat, comfortable and stylish.  Its brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple and light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple and light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A long knitted cotton scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A warm wool mask that protects the head and face from cold.  It has a full face opening that can be adjusted to set how much is exposed.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A warm wool mask that protects the head and face from cold.  It has a full face opening that can be adjusted to set how much is exposed.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple metal whistle, with a cord to wear it around your neck.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple wooden acoustic guitar with a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A standard factory-made electric guitar.  It's probably better at smashing heads than melting faces, these days.  Has a strap.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A traditional musical instrument using enclosed reeds fed from a reservoir of air contained within a leather bag.  It has a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

{'//~': "ol' is an informal short-form for old, and here is part of big-ol as large-and-cumbersome.", 'str': "A big ol' tuba.  Much easier to play when wearing."}  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A brass alto saxophone with a neck strap, so you can wear it while playing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
This is a medical listening tool.  Use it to listen to things.  Closely.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
This is a relatively cumbersome DIY child's medical listening toy.  Use it to listen to things.  Closely.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Personal portable charging system consisting of an array of solar panels neatly folded in a form of a large backpack.  It can be worn as one, and has an integrated cable to plug it into a cable charger system.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Unfolded array of portable solar panels ready to push some power into an active cable charger system.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A helmet with a plastic shield that covers your entire face.  Activate to raise the face shield.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A riot helmet with a plastic face shield which is raised up.  Activate to lower the shield.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This is a high-pressure 232 bar diving tank that can contain up to 12L of compressed mixture of oxygen and nitrogen.  It is equipped with an on-demand regulator and a mouthpiece designed mostly for underwater use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
